codes:
import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))

l = 0
r = 0
max_sum = 0

for i in range(n):
    sum = 0
    for j in range(i, n):
        sum += a[j]
        if sum > max_sum:
            max_sum = sum
            l = i
            r = j

print(r - l + 1)

import math
n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
l = 0
r = 0
m = 0
for i in range(n):
    s = 0
    for j in range(i, n):
        s += a[j]
        if s > m:
            m = s
            l = i
            r = j
print(r - l + 1)

import math

n = int(input())

a = list(map(int, input().split()))

l = 0
r = 0
max_sum = 0

for i in range(n):
    sum = 0
    for j in range(i, n):
        sum += a[j]
        if sum > max_sum:
            max_sum = sum
            l = i
            r = j

print(r - l + 1)
